review: It is great if you are trying to make a non-smart tv into a smart tv. If you currently own a smart tv there really is no reason for this product. Once more apps start to support Chromecast it will become much more useful.

review: The setup is easy. To use it is easier. The major problem is you can only use it, with very few apps. If you want to listen to your own music library , it has to be uploaded first to the cloud.

review: I purchased it at the end of December 2013, it stopped connecting to my iphone5 in the I middle of March, and thus becoming totally useless.  I used it solely to watch movies from Netflix and would not purchase another one.  Its main short coming is the need to use a certain smart phone to transmit the signals.  It is main advantage is its small size and portability.  It is not cheap if it failed to work after 3 months.Other devices such as the Roku, a small form factor PC or an old playstation-3 are much more reliable and better choices for watching netflix movies.
author: Kin H. Yu
